Description: Available 9/1! Large 4 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment that was recently renovated! New kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors throughout, in-unit laundry, private deck and turf patio. All 4 bedrooms are generous sized. Private deck and turf backyard area! 1 off street parking spot included in the rent. Less than 5 minute walk to Target, Stop N Shop and Middlesex Fells Park. Just off the Fellsway in West Medford right by 93. Only 10 minutes to Boston. Pets negotiable.
